articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Denounces U.S. and IAEA for Pulling Up DPRK over LWR Construction
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Denounces U.S. and IAEA for Pulling Up DPRK over LWR Construction
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Wednesday as regards the U.S. and the International Atomic Energy Agency's (IAEA) unreasonable pulling up of the DPRK over its construction of light water reactor (LWR):
					The director general of the IAEA in a recent report submitted to a meeting of the IAEA board of governors said the DPRK's LWR construction and the uranium enrichment activities arouse serious concerns.
					
					Echoing this, the spokesman for the U.S. State Department urged the DPRK to stop nuclear activities including the LWR construction and accept the IAEA inspection.
					
					IAEA aggravated the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula pursuant to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK. This deprived the IAEA of the qualifications to intervene in the DPRK's nuclear activities. But it has not yet come to its senses. 
					
					IAEA has not voiced concerns over the nuclear programs of other nuclear states. It only expressed concerns over the DPRK's nuclear program, an indication of its partial approach toward the DPRK. 
					
					IAEA and the U.S. should not try to view the prevailing situation with the old standard in the period when the DPRK's nuclear activities were confined to the peaceful purposes only.
					
					The DPRK, which legitimately accessed nukes to cope with the U.S. persistent hostile policy, has its own standard on which IAEA's function is not workable as the function mainly deals with non nuclear states.
					
					IAEA and the U.S. should act with discretion, clearly facing up to the situation.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Clarifies the DPRK's Stand on DPRK-Japan Inter-Governmental Talks
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Clarifies the DPRK's Stand on DPRK-Japan Inter-Governmental Talks
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA Wednesday as regards the preliminary talks between the governments of the DPRK and Japan:
					There took place section chief-level preliminary talks between the governments of the DPRK and Japan in Beijing, China from August 29 to 31.
					
					At the bilateral Red-Cross talks that were held before the preliminary talks, both sides reached the consensus of view that government involvement is necessary for a satisfactory solution to the issue of remains of Japanese buried in the Korean soil. The preliminary talks are the results of suggestions made by the participants in the Red-Cross talks to their governments. 
					
					At the preliminary talks, both sides informed the other side of their stands on the inter-governmental talks that will be held regarding the issue of the remains of Japanese. They also discussed the issues concerning the agenda items, level, place and time for the talks and agreed to provide coordination through diplomatic channel in the future. 
					
					In this regard, the Japanese government and political and media fields are saying that the DPRK accepted the inclusion of "abduction issue" in the main agenda items of the talks and the DPRK is expecting sort of economic rewards through the issue of remains of Japanese. But this is a sheer lie.
					
					The misrepresentation of facts which is a mockery of the good faith shown by the DPRK increases the suspicion as to the Japanese side's abuse of the issue of remains for meeting its sordid political purpose.
					
					The DPRK has approached the issue of the remains of Japanese in good faith and with magnanimity from the humanitarian stand and will keep doing so.
					
					But if Japan keeps seeking an ulterior political purpose, it will adversely affect the DPRK-Japan inter-governmental talks.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Expresses Condolences to Moon Sun Myung's Bereaved Family
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Expresses Condolences to Moon Sun Myung's Bereaved Family
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a message of condolences to the bereaved family of Moon Sun Myung, president of the World Peace Federation, on Wednesday.
					The message said:
					
					I express my deep condolences to widow Han Hak Ja and the bereaved family upon receiving the sad news that Moon Sun Myung, president of the World Peace Federation, died of illness.
					
					Though he passed away, his efforts and feats made for the reconciliation and unity of the nation, the reunification of the country and the world peace will last forever.

articles.title: SPA Session to Be Convened in DPRK
articles.content:
SPA Session to Be Convened in DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly Monday made public a decision on convening a session of the Supreme People's Assembly.
					According to the decision, the 6th Session of the 12th SPA is to be held in Pyongyang on September 25.

articles.title: Media Should Maintain Impartiality in Report about DPRK
articles.content:
Media Should Maintain Impartiality in Report about DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Commission for Joint Venture and Investment on September 5 issued the following statement:
					The Xiyang Group of the Haicheng City, Liaoning Province of China on August 2 posted on its Internet website an article criticizing the DPRK over the disputes that cropped up between the Group and the Korean Ryongbong Corporation in the course of implementing a joint venture contract for the development of magnetite concentrated ore. 
					
					After the article was published, some media echoed it before and after the report about the results of the third meeting of the DPRK-China Guidance Committee for developing two economic zones was made public.
					
					They added their own analyses to the article posted by the Group. They even aired what the anti-DPRK hostile forces reported in the past to malignantly slander the inviolable social system and policy of the DPRK.
					
					Generally, it is international usage and commercial ethics to settle disputes that occurred in the course of economic relations in line with the relevant arbitration item of the contract.
					
					But the media have kicked off massive propaganda campaign, defying international usage and commercial order. This cannot be interpreted otherwise than an act of fanning up the dishonest forces in their moves to drive a wedge between the two countries in their economic cooperation and chill the atmosphere for investment.
					
					As far as the procedures for the signing and implementation of the contract between the DPRK Ryongbong Corporation and the Steel Co. Ltd., of the Group and the bilateral disputes are concerned, the Group is also to blame for the abrogation of the contract. In the light of the process of implementing the obligations under the contract, the Group is chiefly to blame from the legal point of view.
					
					It has carried out only 50 percent of its investment obligations though almost four years have past since the contract took effect.
					
					So the two contracting parties again sat together only in vain over the timeline for the completion of the first-phase investment and commissioning.
					
					As for 16 provisions which the Group set forth as the major issue of the disputes, it is the legal obligation of the Group related to the contract to implement them according to the mutual contract in which both sides agreed on the article that "two sides sign it on the basis of the DPRK Law on Joint Venture".
					
					As regards the dealing of sales price of trial products, the Group insisted on its self-opinionated proposal for settling its debts within the boundary of China, in disregard of the procedures in price dealing pursuant to the relevant financial management norms.
					
					Media should comply with the standards for fairness and objectivity, create an atmosphere helpful to settling the disputes between the two contracting parties and refrain from an act that can be misused by the hostile forces for their vicious propaganda.
					
					We will in the future, too, improve and round off the investment environment to further expand the international investment relations to meet the demand of the developing times and the lawful requirement of the international investment relations under the condition that the security of the country is guaranteed by dint of Songun. We will also ensure the legitimate rights and interests of all investors willing to develop international investment relations on the principles of mutual respects, equality, reciprocity and law-observance.

articles.title: Greetings to King of Swaziland on Its 44th Independence Anniversary
articles.content:
Greetings to King of Swaziland on Its 44th Independence Anniversary
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greeting to the king of Swaziland Wednesday on the 44th anniversary of its independence.
					He sincerely wished the king and people of Swaziland success in their work for the country's stability and development, expressing belief that the bilateral friendly and cooperative ties will be closer.

articles.title: Ex-Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Lays Wreath before Friendship Tower
articles.content:
Ex-Chinese Ambassador to DPRK Lays Wreath before Friendship Tower
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Ex-Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Wan Yongxiang and his party laid a wreath before the Friendship Tower Wednesday.
					The guests placed the wreath before it in their name.
					
					They observed a moment's silence to the memory of the fallen fighters of the Chinese People's Volunteers who bravely fought in the Korean front against the U.S. imperialists' invasion before looking round the tower.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates Here to Mark Anniversary of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates Here to Mark Anniversary of DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of groups for the study of the Juche idea of different countries arrived here by air Tuesday to mark the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					Among them were a delegation of the International Committee for the Study of Songun Politics for Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Nepal led by Chairman Basanta Kumar Shrestha, a delegation of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Chairman Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, a delegation of the Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea led by Chairman Ivan Draxler, a delegation of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia led by Chairman Anatoli Nikolayevich Dolgachev, a delegation of the Society for the Study of Self-Reliance of Pakistan led by Secretary General Javed Ahmed Ansari, a delegation of the Mongolian Mt. Paektu Association for Independent Development led by Member of the Leadership Council N. Sarantuya, a delegation of the Mongolian Association for the Study of Juche Idea-Songun led by Member Tseden Enkh-Uyanga, a delegation for Studying the Juche Idea of Slovenia led by Igor Jurisic, Rohekele 
					
					Andre, vice-chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, Dermot Hudson, chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, and Yecenia Garcia, chief of the Venezuelan Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign delegations and delegates visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday. They included the military delegation of Cuban revolutionary armed forces, delegations and delegates of groups for the study of the Juche idea of different countries and the delegation of the Communist Youth Collectives of Spain.
					The visitors laid floral baskets before the statues and paid respects to the peerlessly great men who performed grandiose feats for global independence. 
					
					The members of the WHO mission in the DPRK also presented a floral basket before the statues on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK on the same day.

articles.title: Visits
articles.content:
Visits
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK governmental economic and trade delegation headed by So Kil Bok, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, left here Wednesday to take part in the 8th Jilin, China-Northeast Asia Investment and Trade Expo to be held in Changchun, China and the 6th high-level forum for Northeast Asia economic and trade joint venture.
					Arriving here on the same day were a military delegation of Cuban revolutionary armed forces led by Joaquin Quintas Sola, vice-minister of Revolutionary Armed Forces, and Osvaldo Napoli, chairman of the Committee for the Development of Relations and Cooperation with the DPRK of the Parliament who is vice-president of the Parliamentary Group of the Popular Liberty of the Chamber of Deputies of Italy, and his party.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Indian President
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Indian President Pranab Mukherjee on Monday.
					The message extended warm greetings and congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the fraternal people of the DPRK on its founding anniversary.
					
					The relations between the DPRK and India have traditionally been those of friendship and amity, the message said, believing that the bilateral cooperative relations would further develop in the mutual interests of the two peoples.
					
					The message sincerely wished Kim Jong Un happiness and the fraternal DPRK people success and prosperity and once again paid noblest respects to him.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Guinean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Guinean President
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Guinean President Alpha Conde on Aug. 29.
					The president in the message extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un in the name of the Guinean government and people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					It expressed again the willingness to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Guinea in a multi-lateral way.
					
					It paid noblest respects to Kim Jong Un and sincerely wished him good health and happy life and the Korean people peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Congolese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Congolese President
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Congolese President Denis Sassou Nguesso on August 30.
					The president, availing himself of the celebration of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK, extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the people and government of Congo and on his own behalf and wished the friendly Korean people happiness and prosperity.
					
					He expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would further develop in the interests of the peoples of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Ugandan President
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on August 30.
					The president, on behalf of the government and people of Uganda, extended warm greetings to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the 64th anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					Ugandan people extend congratulations to Kim Jong Un and people of the DPRK on this auspicious day, he said.
					
					He expressed satisfaction over the good relations and cooperation between the two countries, reaffirming his resolution to work in close ties with Kim Jong Un to further develop these relations in the interests of the two countries.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lesotho PM
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Lesotho PM
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of greeting from Lesotho Prime Minister Thomas Motsoahe Thabane on August 29.
					The prime minister said that he was greatly honored to extend the most sincere congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the auspicious celebration of the 64th anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					He, availing himself of the celebration of the important day in the history of the DPRK, sincerely hoped that the good and warm relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the fraternal two countries and their peoples.
					
					He sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and the people of the DPRK peace and eternal prosperity.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Scientist and Official of Merit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Birthday Spreads to Scientist and Official of Merit
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent a birthday spread to Prof. and Dr. Kim U Bom, researcher at the Agricultural Science Institute of Wonsan University of Agriculture, on his 80th birthday.
					He also sent a spread to Sin Jae Wan, manager of the Ponghwa Chemical Factory, on his 70th birthday.
					
					Kim U Bom has devoted himself to the education for rising generations and scientific research for more than five decades.
					
					He dedicated his wisdom and energy to training students as able personnel of agricultural technology. He authored many textbooks, reference and other books and registered successes in scientific researches conducive to the agricultural development of the country.
					
					Sin has successfully managed his factory to contribute to over-fulfilling the annual economic plan over the past two decades.
					
					He has striven to further display the honor of his factory associated with the leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and spruce up his factory as required by Songun era.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il showed such great loving care for them as inviting them to important meetings and awarding orders and medals to them.

articles.title: National Angling Contest Held
articles.content:
National Angling Contest Held
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The 11th national angling contest was held on the bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					The contest brought together more than 50 anglers selected from Pyongyang City and provinces.
					
					The standings were decided by the number of fishes (each being over 10 cm long) caught within three hours.
					
					Each angler was allowed to use two sets of fishing tackle, including pole-and-line and gear fishhooks.
					
					Kim Tae Gip, 72, from Mangyongdae District, Pyongyang, was the first to hook a fish, ten minutes after the beginning of the contest.
					
					Anglers were given cheers by spectators whenever they caught fishes.
					
					Kim Sun Il, secretary of the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, told KCNA:
					
					"The contest witnessed improved angling skills.
					
					The annual contest gives a glimpse of the emotional life enjoyed by the people under the care of the Workers' Party of Korea."
					
					Diplomas and prizes were awarded to good anglers. The top prize went to Pak Mun Sik, 51, living in Taedonggang District, Pyongyang, who was also a winner in the 9th national angling contest.
					
					Pak said that to catch fish in the River Taedong is an exceptional amusement for him.
					
					A technical prize was awarded to Kim Hong Chol, 48, from Phyongwon County, South Phyongan Province, for having caught the biggest fish.
					
					Meanwhile, an exhibition of fishing tackles took place on the spot on the same day.

articles.title: Agricultural Trial Center in Rason
articles.content:
Agricultural Trial Center in Rason
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- There is a highly efficient agricultural trial center in the Rason Economic and Trade Zone in the DPRK.
					It is run by the Rason Baidahuang Friendship Agricultural Company, which was established under an agreement of Rason City's relevant institution and China's Baidahuang Group.
					
					The center, jointly operated by Korean and Chinese agro-technicians and workers, cultivates 560 hectares of cropland, majoring in rice farming.
					
					It has rice seedling cultivation hothouses covering 6.7 hectares, 400 square meters each. Various species of vegetables, including tomato, cucumber and eggplant, are also grown in hothouses.
					
					All the hothouses are designed in a way to easily adjust sunshine, indoor temperature and watering.
					
					The center is highly appreciated for its efficient farming method.

articles.title: KPA Inspired by Military Songs
articles.content:
KPA Inspired by Military Songs
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea boasts of many military songs, which lively represent the heroic spirit of the Korean People's Army.
					Among them is the "Song of the Korean People's Army", created in Juche 57 (1968).
					
					The song features the morale and invincible strength of the KPA that has inherited the brilliant traditions of the anti-Japanese armed struggle led by the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung and is entrusted with lofty mission to defend the Party, leader, country and people.
					
					The song has encouraged the KPA soldiers in military training and socialist construction.
					
					"Leader, Just Give Us Your Order" and "We Will Hold Arms More Tightly" are songs created in the 1970s when the Korean Peninsula was under the touch-and-go situation due to the Panmunjom incident orchestrated by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					Encouraged by the songs, the army and people of the DPRK strikingly demonstrated their will to deal an annihilating blow to the U.S. provokers.
					
					"Song of the Korean People's Army" has been played in celebration art performances, military parades and meetings, calling upon the Korean people to turn out in defending the country.
					
					The military songs play a big role in inspiring the KPA to uphold the Party's Songun (military-first) politics and urging the whole society to keep to the road of socialism.
					
					Marshal Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the KPA, when guiding a concert of the KPA Brass Band a few days ago, said that "Song of the Korean People's Army" touches the heartstring of the people and that the KPA would advance along with the band's songs, when it is ordered to launch a great war for national reunification.

articles.title: Koreans Called on to Turn Out in War for National Reunification
articles.content:
Koreans Called on to Turn Out in War for National Reunification
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun in a bylined article Wednesday appealed to the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to turn out in holy patriotic actions to wipe out the war maniacs, well aware of their responsibility and duties before the times and history.
					The Korean nation prides itself on its history in which it has lived harmoniously in the same territory for thousands of years and set up a unified state in the eastern corner of the world long ago, fully demonstrating its wisdom and bravery, the article says, and goes on:
					
					However, the dignified nation has suffered from the division at the hands of outsiders century after century, an intolerable tragedy and humiliation.
					
					The Koreans have strenuously made efforts for national reunification for decades.
					
					The adoption of the June 15 joint declaration that caught the world interest was an event of great significance that gave the hope of independent reunification to the Korean nation.
					
					However, this hope was dashed by traitors to the nation who threw cold water on it in collusion with outsiders.
					
					The Lee Myung Bak puppet regime of south Korea which has become as good as dead is forsaken by south Korean people for its sycophantic and traitorous actions, policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen and unpopular rule, being condemned and rejected at home and abroad. However, the Lee regime is going reckless to unleash a war against the DPRK with its American master in order to escape the crisis.
					
					The great just war for national reunification is the only way to put an end to the confrontation and war moves of the U.S. and the south Korean war-like forces which bring Koreans untold disasters only.
					
					The Korean nation will become victor in the just sacred war as they have towering hatred and thoughts of revenge on the invaders and traitors and the patriotic spirit for reunification.
					
					If the enemies fire even a single bullet into the territory of the DPRK, all the Koreans will wage the merciless war for the country's reunification, by giving vent to the wrath and grudge pent up for nearly seven decades, in the spirit of annihilating the enemies, and thus wipe out the U.S. imperialists and traitors and win a great victory.

articles.title: DPRK Doctorate in Philosophy Awarded to Chinese Teacher
articles.content:
DPRK Doctorate in Philosophy Awarded to Chinese University Teacher
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Doctorate in Philosophy was awarded to Ryu Hye Son, teacher of Yanbian University of China, with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Wednesday.
					She expounded that the ardent loyalty to the leader and faith and will for Songun idea constitute the core of psychology of the members of Kim Il Sung's nation and on this basis comprehensively dealt with the course of its formation and development, making a contribution to the development of psychology.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Decries S. Korea's Rhetoric against DPRK
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- There took place in the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre Wednesday a meeting to mark the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il 's work "On Effecting a Revolutionary Advance in the Production of Works of Art and Literature".
					The work, published on Sept. 6, 1972, sets forth tasks for firmly establishing the monolithic ideological system of the Party among the creators, transforming people in revolutionary and working-class way with responsibility and producing more pieces of literature and arts conducive to the revolutionary education of the people.
					
					The work also clarifies such issues as correctly combining the ideological value and artistry by applying the theory of seed in producing works, grasping the reality, vividly reflecting it and abiding by the principle of originality and non-repetition.
					
					An Tong Chun, chairman of the Central Committee of the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, in a report referred to the brilliant developments made by literature and arts of the DPRK for 4 decades after the publication of the work.
					
					He said that the creators and artistes prepared themselves to be strong and able forces of building socialist literature and arts, armed with the Juche idea of the Party and its policy of literature and arts.
					
					He noted that varieties of works were produced to show the glorious revolutionary history and the undying feats of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu, and they positively contributed to the realization of the cause of perpetuating the memory of the leaders and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					The five revolutionary operas and revolutionary dramas and other famous masterpieces were produced to enrich the treasure house of the literature and arts of Juche, and a lot of famous songs were created to instill confidence in victory of revolution and courage into all the servicepersons and people.
					
					The reporter called upon all the officials, creators and artistes to apply the Juche-based literature and arts of the Party so as to add shine to the flower garden of the Songun literature and arts.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of Terrorism by Proxy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Danger of Terrorism by Proxy
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has recently done harm to the sovereignty of other countries by employing a variety of crafty methods.
					One of them is rallying the international reactionaries including the traitors and supplying them with funds and weapons to abet them in anti-government actions against certain countries.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a bylined article that terrorism by proxy is a stereotyped method the U.S. has used historically targeting anti-imperialist independent countries on which its military muscle and psychological warfare are not workable. 
					
					The terrorism by proxy is, in essence, a crafty method employed by the U.S. to pit other countries and nations against another and fish in troubled waters, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					To take an example, the intelligence service and plot-breeding institutions of the U.S. formed vicious terrorist organizations against the DPRK and provided them with a large amount of funds and destructive means, prodding them to commit terrorism and sabotages against the DPRK.
					
					The U.S. Central Intelligence Agency has intensified its branches in south Korea as never before, while the south Korean puppet regime in collusion with the U.S. allured or abducted DPRK civilians to south Korea and used them for the anti-DPRK smear campaign. The regime even sent defectors to south Korea and traitors back to the DPRK assigned with the duties of the subversive activities and sabotages.
					
					However, no form of terrorism will prove effective in the DPRK.
					
					The more the U.S. resorts to vicious maneuvers, the more DPRK will heighten the revolutionary vigilance and bolster the military capacity, 
					
					The anti-U.S. independent countries should keep vigilant against the U.S. imperialists' terrorism by proxy, the article warns.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns U.S. MD Moves
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns U.S. MD Moves
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Of late, the U.S. State Department spokesperson, when asked about the U.S. stance toward the media reports about the U.S. stepped-up expansion of the missile defence system (MD) in East Asian region, made such poor excuses that the MD is not targeting China. He further described it as defensive, saying that it stems from the fear of the "missile threat from North Korea". 
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a bylined article says in this regard:
					
					What the spokesman said is just a pretext to justify the U.S. arms build-up.
					
					The U.S. MD plan encompasses the whole world including the Northeast Asia, the Middle East and Europe.
					
					After cease of the Cold War, the U.S. pushed ahead with the MD establishment in real earnest, another version of the "star wars", under the pretext of coping with what it called new "challenge".
					
					The MD which is now in the phase of deployment for actual wars by joint efforts of the U.S. and Japan covers the vast areas of Asia including the Korean Peninsula, the northeastern region of China as well as the Far Eastern region of Russia.
					
					The U.S. is seeking to draw south Korea and other countries to the system.
					
					After revising the original plan to establish MD only in Poland and the Czech Republic of Europe, the U.S. is now busy making preparations for its establishment in the vast areas of Europe.
					
					U.S. missiles are being deployed in Turkey and Israel.
					
					The U.S. MD moves are, in essence, aimed to form a powerful missile attack network on Eurasia.
					
					Such action will spark off a new arms race in the Asia-Pacific region, seriously threatening the peace and security in the region.
					
					The world peace-loving people should wage dynamic actions to foil the U.S. moves, properly understanding the criminal nature and danger of the MD moves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Totally Negating Its Past Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japan of Totally Negating Its Past Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Ishihara, Tokyo Metropolitan governor, and Hashimoto, mayor of Osaka City of Japan, recently made such rubbish that there is no evidence to prove Japanese imperialists' forcible drafting of sexual slaves, adding they want to see evidence.
					Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a bylined commentary.
					
					These two militarist maniacs who took the lead in evading and distorting Japan's past crime are working hard to negate again the Japanese imperialists' past crimes related to sexual slavery, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					The sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is so hideous crime that all the people around the world demand the Japanese government make apology and reparation, irrespective of political view, religious belief and ethnicity. Witnesses, outcries and evidence made by survivors of the slavery would be enough to cover the whole territory of Japan.
					
					Japanese politicians' total negation and distortion of the sexual slavery are crimes going against history. The Japanese reactionaries' act of feigning ignorance of Japan's past crime-woven history is an outrageous mockery and unpardonable insult to the victims, survivors and the world conscience and justice.
					
					The history does not change by one's assertions.
					
					The Japanese reactionaries would only face disgraceful destruction if they go reckless without elementary reason.
					
					The progressive mankind will surely force the Japanese imperialists to pay for hideous crimes against humanity.

articles.title: S. Korean Army Plans War Drill against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Army Plans War Drill against DPRK
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The 17th Division of the south Korean Army is planning to stage a provocative war exercise for invading the DPRK in Inchon and Puchon and Kimpho areas of Kyonggi Province from Sept. 10 to 14, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					The war-like forces seek to mobilize lots of war equipment and troops for the drill aimed at establishing the capability of performing combined defense operation among civilians, government, military and police while pulling up the DPRK over "local provocation."
					
					Such reckless war moves are creating a touch-and-go situation in the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korea's "Human Rights" Racket at Int'l Conference under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's "Human Rights" Racket at Int'l Conference under Fire
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak regime of south Korea openly says that it "plans to highlight the north's human rights issue" with the International Pen Conference due in south Korea in mid-September as a momentum. It even seeks to draw the "Pen Center of Defectors from the North", a plot-breeding organization, into the International Pen Club.
					Minju Joson Wednesday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					Terming the regime's projected anti-DPRK "human rights" racket a revelation of its sinister design to escalate confrontation with the fellow countrymen, the commentary goes on:
					
					It is its ulterior intention to step up rhetoric against the compatriots in the international arena through such anti-DPRK burlesque, not just confining it in south Korea.
					
					It is so impudent for the group of traitors to talk about "human rights."
					
					It is south Korea where elementary freedom and rights of people are trampled down by the fascist "Security Law" and such hideous crimes as kidnapping and killing of children are committed in an unbroken chain. Its human rights abuses can be proved by the fact that it gagged the progressive media organizations and persons to deceive south Koreans and massively fired conscientious media persons and put them into custody.
					
					Lurking behind the projected "human rights" racket by the Lee group and the "Saenuri Party" is a sinister political purpose to tide over the daily worsening ruling crisis, incite hostility between compatriots in the north and the south  and escalate the inter-Korean confrontation.
					
					The fair public and intellectuals speaking for justice and truth will never pardon the group's confrontation moves.
					
					The group of traitors is set to turn the Conference into the theater of an anti-DPRK "human rights" racket but it will become one of punishing it.

articles.title: S. Korean Prosecution Accused of Its Politically-motivated Suppression of Opposition Party
articles.content:
S. Korean Prosecution Accused of Its Politically-motivated Suppression of Opposition Party
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The members of the opposition Unified Progressive Party of south Korea held a press conference in the "National Assembly" building on Aug. 29 in protest against the prosecution's political suppression.
					The prosecution recently opened to public the private information of the party members of the Unified Progressive Party under the pretext of "investigation" and intensified suppression by issuing summons at random, they said, and went on:
					
					The suppression of the opposition party members and human rights abuses remind one of the reckless acts of the past dictatorial regime.
					
					The prosecution, which had served as a waiting maid of the Lee Myung Bak regime, is openly stepping up the suppression of the opposition party at the end of the Lee's office aimed at the "Saenuri Party's" stay in power.
					
					The search of the building of the opposition party and confiscation of the membership list happened under the present regime, they said, adding this was attributable to its intention to root out the progressive party and curb solidarity with the opposition parties so as to deter the change of the regime at the "presidential" election.
					
					They said they would deal with the prosecution's unreasonable suppression by concerted efforts.
					
					They demanded the prosecution stop the suppression of the opposition party and the chief prosecutor step down.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of International Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on Internet Website of International Organization
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- A detailed content of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was posted by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on its Internet homepage on Aug. 28.
					The work, published on April 20, 2012 clarifies the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. It also deals with the tasks for resolutely defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and feats, etc.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Exploits Lauded by Figures of Sweden, Thailand
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Exploits Lauded by Figures of Sweden, Thailand
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Figures of Sweden and Thailand issued statements on Aug. 23 to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, said Kim Jong Il started the Songun leadership with his inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on Aug. 25, 1960, being keenly aware that arms guarantee the nation's destiny and dignity and peace.
					
					It was thanks to his Songun leadership that the DPRK could turn into a political, ideological and military power and reliably defend its socialism, he stressed.
					
					Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, said Kim Jong Il safeguarded the country, nation, socialism and world peace with his Songun politics and turned the DPRK into a military power which no formidable enemies dare provoke, adding this is the biggest exploit performed by him with patriotism.
					
					Chanai Longoen, chairman of the Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association, praised Kim Jong Il, possessed of the love for country and the people as his gifted disposition, as the great revolutionary and peerless patriot who always led to victory the struggle for the defence of the country and its prosperity under the uplifted banner of Songun and thus put the nation's dignity and national power on the highest level.
					
					He expressed belief that the cause of Songun would be invariably carried forward in the DPRK as there is the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, another sun of the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Leadership Marked Abroad
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Media and Internet websites of different countries carried special write-ups to mark the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					The Indian newspaper New Delhi Times on Aug. 21 carried various articles under the caption "On the 52nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership" illustrated with his photo.
					
					The paper said the DPRK, which had undergone a miserable fate as a small colonial state a century ago, demonstrated its might to the world as a political, ideological and military power under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who successfully carried forward the cause of President Kim Il Sung, pioneer of the Songun revolutionary cause.
					
					It is thanks to the tremendous might of Songun that the DPRK exercises its sovereignty with dignity on the international arena and steadily advances toward socialism, the road of independence, it noted. 
					
					Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il stands in the van of the Korean people, it stressed.
					
					The Nepalese newspaper Nepal Today on Aug. 22 carried a photo of Kim Jong Il and introduced in detail achievements made by the Korean people wrought in the general offensive for building a thriving socialist nation under his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					AKP of Cambodia and the Internet homepage of the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship on Aug. 20 spoke highly of the Songun revolutionary leadership exploits of the peerlessly great leaders of the DPRK.

articles.title: Songun Is Precious Heritage of Korean Revolution: Foreigners
articles.content:
Songun Is Precious Heritage of Korean Revolution: Foreigners
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Songun is a precious heritage of the Korean revolution, which is given steady continuity in the DPRK, said personages of Bangladesh and Sweden in their statements on Aug. 21 and 22.
					Hasanul Huq Inu, chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, said that leader Kim Jong Il, who inherited the Songun leadership exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, formulated the Songun politics as the main political mode under socialism and put the overall national power on a new level in reliance on the powerful military capabilities.
					
					He was convinced that the army and people of the DPRK closely united around the dear respected Kim Jong Un would defend their socialist country under the banner of the great Songun and win only victory and glory in their efforts for building a reunified thriving nation.
					
					Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said it was thanks to the Songun leadership of  Kim Jong Il that the might of the Korean People's Army and the great army-people unity have remarkably increased and the DPRK creditably defended the country's sovereignty and dignity while foiling the imperialists' repeated military provocations.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK are now replete with their resolution never to pardon the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean authorities but accomplish the cause of national reunification by dint of Songun, the chief said, stressing Songun, valuable heritage of Korean revolution, is being carried forward by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Seminars Mark Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership
articles.content:
Seminars Mark Anniversary of Start of Songun Leadership
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Seminars took place in different countries on the occasion of the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					Seminars were held by the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, a company of Indonesia and the German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association between August 23 and 25.
					
					The chairperson of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said in a report:
					
					More than half a century has passed since Kim Jong Il visited the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army, signaling the start of the Songun leadership but the meaning of the Songun politics remains unchanged. Songun is the supreme expression of Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					The dear respected Kim Jong Un in his recent work called upon all the people to learn from Kim Jong Il's strong sense of patriotism.
					
					Kim Jong Il was a great man who clearly demonstrated before the whole world the great advantages of socialism over capitalism.
					
					The vice-chairman of the party noted that Kim Jong Il was an outstanding thinker, theoretician and statesman who fully applied the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The director of the Indonesian company said that the army and people of the DPRK rallied close around Marshal Kim Jong Un are upholding his Songun leadership with loyalty.
					
					A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in Germany.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Regional Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised by Regional Organization
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- The Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea issued its bulletin on August 25, the 52nd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					In an article titled "Footprints of devotion" the bulletin said he covered the path of Songun all his life.
					
					Thanks to his devotion the military muscle of the DPRK has been put on the highest level so that any formidable enemy dare not provoke, it noted, and went on:
					
					The DPRK access to powerful nuclear deterrent ended the era when the imperialists threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with A-bombs.
					
					Kim Jong Il devoted his whole life only to the happiness of the people.
					
					It was his idea to build a thriving socialist nation which has strong power and in which everything prospers and the people live well with no more to desire in the world. Thanks to his devotion the city construction, the construction of nature-driven waterways and large-scale land rezoning projects had been pushed forward in the DPRK, face-lifting the country as required by the 21st century.
					
					His long journey of patriotism and devotion will shine long together with the prospering socialist country.

articles.title: DPRK's Educational System Introduced by Foreign Media
articles.content:
DPRK's Educational System Introduced by Foreign Media
						
Pyongyang, September 5 (KCNA) -- Internet homepages and paper of foreign countries carried articles between August 24 and 26 on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of President Kim Il Sung's work "Theses on Socialist Education".
					The work, published on September 5, 1977, clarifies the fundamental principles of socialist pedagogy, the content and methods of socialist education as well as the orientation and ways for successfully developing socialist education.
					
					Internet homepage of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea said the education system of the DPRK has developed into the most advantageous and advanced education system after the release of the theses on education. It went on:
					
					Students and children of the DPRK won victory after victory at international mathematics Olympiad and other world academic contests and international concours in recent years, proof of the high level of education in the DPRK.
					
					The higher education system is also in place in the DPRK. Students are studying free of charge, even receiving scholarship, at universities and colleges which are equipped with all conditions.
					
					The study-while-working education system including factory and farm colleges teaches basic science and technology and specialized technologies to working people in vocations.
					
					A travel company of Germany posted on its Internet homepage the following article:
					
					Manpower trained by the socialist education of the DPRK has become good assets for building a thriving nation.
					
					The DPRK is making a leaping advance in building a thriving nation. This is a brilliant fruition of the theses on socialist education.
					
					The Nepali paper Arpan under the title "The Juche idea and development of science and technology" introduced the rapidly developing science and technology of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita las familias mudadas a la avenida Changjon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita las familias mudadas a la avenida Changjon
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, visito con su esposa      Ri Sol Ju a las familias de los trabajadores que se mudaron a la avenida Changjon.
					En primer lugar, estuvo en la casa de Sim Tong Su, profesor de la Universidad de Maquinaria de Pyongyang, quien vive en el apto. no. 1 del tercer piso del vestibulo no.1 de la primera unidad de vecinos del barrio Jongno.
					
					Dijo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il prestaba profunda atencion a la construccion de las nuevas viviendas en la avenida Changjon, en particular, definio el solar y examino hasta el diseno y la ejecucion de la obra, y agrego que si el estuviera vivo, las habria visitado primero. 
					
					El Mariscal paso revista a todas las habitaciones y departio sentado en el suelo con los familiares de Sim. 
					
					Pregunto con carino si les gustaba la nueva casa diciendo que si bien recibio el parte de los cuadros de que los habitantes estan satisfechos de sus nuevas viviendas, no pudo venir temprano porque no le alcanzaba el tiempo. 
					
					Dijo sentirse despreocupado al escuchar la respuesta de los familiares de Sim de que les gustan todas las cosas tanto la estructura de cuartos como los muebles.
					
					Es una costumbre nacional regalar una caja de fosforos a los inquilinos de nueva casa, dijo y agrego que ademas de fosforo, trajo otros articulos de uso domestico. 
					
					Tambien entrego las "antologias de famosos cuentos infantiles del mundo" diciendo que las guardaran bien y se las dieran a los nietos que van a nacer.
					
					Enseno minuciosamente que las televisoras de gran tamano afectan la vista si las ven de cerca y sonrio viendo a los familiares de Sim que se pusieron alegres por el juego de vasijas regalado. 
					
					Pregunto si Sim tenia solo las hijas y escucho satisfecho la respuesta de que el hijo esta pasando el servicio militar en el Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Cuando supo que la esposa y las hijas de Sim son profesoras, dijo que esta familia es la de educadores. 
					
					Como no se ven las raices de arboles gigantescos, la abnegacion de los profesores no salta a la vista ahora, pero se refleja en las generaciones futuras que contribuiran a la prosperidad de la patria, dijo y agrego que esta familia es la de patriotas que forman a los futuros trabajadores de la patria con conciencia limpia. 
					
					Invito a un brindis a los familiares deseando exitos en sus trabajos y se fotografio con ellos. 
					
					Luego, Kim Jong Un visito la familia de Pak Sung Il, obrero de la Empresa de Embellecimiento Urbano del Municipio Jung, quien vive en el apto. no. 2 del tercer piso. 
					
					Estrechando las manos de los familiares de Pak, que le saludaban emocionados, pregunto sus ocupaciones y dijo que todos ellos son obreros. 
					
					Averiguo con afecto paternal las condiciones de vida y departio con los familiares asentados en la nueva y moderna casa.
					
					El Mariscal sento al segundo hijo de Pak sobre sus rodillas y le acaricio preguntandole en que escuela estudia, cuantos anos tiene y si tiene hermanos.
					
					Expreso lastima al escuchar que no ha regresado todavia de la escuela el primer hijo que cursa en el tercer grado de la secundaria. 
					
					En el dormitorio y la habitacion de estudio de los ninos, el Mariscal vio los dibujos hechos por el segundo hijo y le enseno carinosamente lo que le falta para perfeccionarlos. 
					
					Escucho con satisfaccion a los familiares quienes le dijeron que vivian antes en la casa de un cuarto y les parece increible vivir ahora en esta casa de 5 habitaciones y les gustan mucho los muebles finos y otros utensilios domesticos. 
					
					En nuestro regimen socialista son absolutos los intereses del pueblo y sirven para este todas las politicas del partido y el Estado, dijo y agrego que si hubiera visto esta realidad, cuan alegre se habria puesto el Dirigente Kim Jong Il. 
					
					Al recibir el saludo del primer hijo quien regreso pasado algun tiempo, le pregunto con carino por que ha tardado.
					
					Al escuchar la respuesta de que estuvo en el circulo de futbol, le bendijo su futuro de futbolista. 
					
					El Mariscal y su esposa ofrecieron brindis al matrimonio de Pak y dejaron regalos. 
					
					Ri Sol Ju regalo los platos cocinados personalmente para que los alimentara a los ninos y enseno minuciosamente los metodos de cocina. 
					
					Deseando que la familia obrera de Pak Sung Il y Jang Sun Nyo tenga una vida feliz en la nueva casa, el Mariscal tomo una foto de recuerdo con ellos. 
					
					Por ultimo, el estuvo en la familia del matrimonio recien casado de la Heroina del Trabajo Mun Kang Sun, obrera de la Fabrica Textil Kim Jong Suk de Pyongyang, quien vive en el apto. no. 1 del segundo piso. 
					
					Tras informarse de que ella celebro la boda en mayo pasado y recibio la nueva casa a los dos meses, le pregunto sonriendo como pasaba la vida conyugal y cuantos hijos quiere tener. 
					
					Se rio a carcajadas al escuchar la respuesta del esposo de que quiere tener un hijo y una hija parecida a su madre, tejedora heroina. 
					
					El Mariscal dio brindis al matrimonio obrero, tomo una foto de recuerdo y dejo como recuerdo los utensilios domesticos. 
					
					Tomando las manos de ellos con ojos humedecidos, dijo que vivieran felizmente y volveria a visitarles cuando pase por la avenida Changjon para ver al bebe que van a tener ellos.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias por el deceso de Moon Sun Myung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un expresa condolencias por el deceso de Moon Sun Myung
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un envio el dia 5 un mensaje de condolencias a los familiares de Moon Sun Myung, presidente de la Federacion Mundial de la Paz.
					La misiva va como sigue: 
					
					Al enterarme de la triste noticia sobre el fallecimiento de Moon Sun Myung, presidente de la Federacion Mundial de la Paz, a causa de una enfermedad, expreso profundas condolencias a la senora Han Hak Ja y a los familiares del difunto. 
					
					Aunque fallecio Moon Sun Myung, se transmitiran eternamente sus esfuerzos y meritos realizados por la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion, la reunificacion del pais y la paz mundial.

articles.title: MINREX expone la posicion de RPDC sobre dialogo preliminar con Japon
articles.content:
MINREX expone la posicion de RPDC sobre dialogo preliminar con Japon
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que tuvo lugar el dialogo preliminar entre los gobiernos de Corea y Japon, el portavoz de la cancilleria de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 5 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC.
					Del 29 al 31 de agosto, tuvo lugar en Beijing, China, el dialogo de nivel de jefe de seccion entre los gobiernos de la RPDC y Japon.
					
					En las anteriores conversaciones de cruz roja Corea-Japon, ambas partes coincidieron en la necesidad de la participacion gubernamental para la solucion plena del problema de restos mortales de los japoneses enterrados en el suelo de la RPDC y la propusieron a los respectivos gobiernos.
					
					En el dialogo preliminar, preparado de esa manera, se informaron las posiciones de ambas partes sobre las conversaciones intergubernamentales sobre el tema arriba referido, se debatieron los problemas de trabajo como la agenda, el nivel, la sede, la fecha y otros detalles de esas platicas y se acordo seguir coordinandolos por via diplomatica.
					
					Al respecto, el gobierno, el circulo politico y la prensa de Japon hablan como si la RPDC hubiera aceptado la inclusion del "problema de secuestro" a la agenda de las conversaciones principales y estuviera deseando alguna recompensa economica por el problema de restos mortales. Esto es un embuste no apegado a la realidad.
					
					Tales actos de engano a la opinion publica, que tergiversan la verdad y se burlan de la buena fe de la RPDC, levantan mas sospechas de que la parte japonesa usa el problema de restos mortales en sus siniestros fines politicos.
					
					La RPDC trata ese asunto con buena fe e indulgencia desde la posicion humanitaria y seguira abordandolo de la misma manera.
					
					Si Japon continua persiguiendo solo sus malsanos objetivos politicos, causara influencias negativas a la apertura de las conversaciones intergubernamentales.

articles.title: Portavoz del CEAI rechaza reportes de algunos medios de prensa
articles.content:
Portavoz del CEAI rechaza reportes de algunos medios de prensa
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Empresas Asociadas e Inversiones de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 5 una declaracion que sigue:
					El 2 de agosto, el Grupo Xiyang en la ciudad de Haicheng de la provincia de Liaoning de China publico en Internet un articulo criticando a la RPDC en relacion con el diferendo surgido durante la ejecucion del contrato de asociacion, firmado con la Corporacion Ryongbong de Corea para el desarrollo de la magnetita.
					
					Algunos medios de prensa comenzaron a hacerse eco de ese articulo antes y despues de que se publicara la informacion sobre el resultado de la 3a reunion del Comite de Direccion Conjunta Corea-China para el desarrollo conjunto de dos zonas economicas.
					
					Para colmo, hay medios que hacen comentarios caprichosos, en sintonia con lo que insiste el Grupo Xiyang, mezclando los datos publicados por las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC para calumniar perversamente el sagrado regimen y la politica de ella.
					
					Resolver el conflicto surgido en las transacciones comerciales segun el articulo correspondiente del contrato sobre el arbitraje es una costumbre internacional y etica comercial.
					
					Sin embargo, esos medios se dedican a la campana de propaganda masiva contra la RPDC ayudando a las fuerzas hostiles que pretenden meter cizanas en las relaciones de cooperacion economica RPDC-China y envenenar el clima de inversiones.
					
					Si se hace una breve resena del proceso de firma y cumplimiento del contrato referido y el surgimiento de diferendo, la responsabilidad de la quiebra del contrato recae tambien al Grupo Xiyang.
					
					Mejor dicho, en sentido legal, ese grupo chino tiene la responsabilidad mas grave en el cumplimiento de las obligaciones contractuales.
					
					Pese a que transcurrieron casi 4 anos desde la entrada en vigor del contrato, el Grupo Xiyang cumplio solo en 50 su deber de contribucion en especies.
					
					Por eso, ambas partes del contrato volvieron a discutir el horario de culminacion de inversion de primera etapa y el problema de inauguracion, pero no llegaron a un acuerdo.
					
					Si se analizan desde el punto de vista legal los 16 articulos usados por el Grupo Xiyang como alegato importante para imputar la responsabilidad del conflicto, las companias firmantes ya habian acordado "concertar el contrato en base a la ley de asociacion de la RPDC", por lo cual tienen el compromiso a cumplir el contrato segun ese acuerdo.
					
					En relacion con la disposicion de los ingresos de la venta de productos iniciales, el grupo chino insistio en el proyecto de disposicion unilateral para resolver su endeudamiento en el territorio de China sin observar las normas correspondientes de control financiero.
					
					Los medios de prensa deben mantener la imparcialidad y la objetividad y crear el ambiente que pueda contribuir a la solucion del conflicto entre ambas partes del contrato.
					
					Y no deben cometer actos que puedan aprovechar las fuerzas hostiles en su brutal demagogia sobre la RPDC.
					
					Puesto que ha sido garantizada la seguridad nacional gracias al poderio del Songun, en el futuro tambien, la RPDC mejorara y perfeccionara el ambiente de inversion para ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de inversion internacional conforme a la demanda del desarrollo de la epoca y a lo que exige esa labor.
					
					Igualmente, asegurara los derechos legitimos y los intereses de todos los inversionistas que quieran desarrollar las relaciones de inversion internacional en el principio de respeto mutuo, igualdad, beneficio mutuo y legalidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibio mensaje de presidente indio
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibio mensaje de presidente indio
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 3 el presidente de la Republica de la India, Pranab Mukherjee.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Es un gran placer para mi enviarles a Su Excelencia y al amistoso pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el cordial saludo y la felicitacion con motivo del dia de la fundacion de la RPDC.
					
					Las relaciones entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de la India fueron las tradicionales de amistad y camaraderia.
					
					Estoy seguro de que seguire intensificando mas junto con su gobierno las bilaterales relaciones de cooperacion conforme a los intereses mutuos de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para volver a expresar a Su Excelencia el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion y deseo de todo corazon a Su Excelencia buena salud y al amistoso pueblo de vuestro pais exitos y prosperidad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente guineo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente guineo
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le dedicara el 29 de agosto el presidente de la Republica de Guinea, Alpha Conde.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hago llegar a Su Excelencia la mas calurosa felicitacion en nombre del gobierno y el pueblo de Guinea y en el mio propio.
					
					Me alegro mucho de que en esta oportunidad dichosa vuelvo a expresar mi irrestricta voluntad de intensificar y desarrollar multilateralmente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica de Guinea.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon a Su Excelencia buena salud y felicitad y al pueblo coreano la paz y prosperidad. 
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente congoleno
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente congoleno
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 30 de agosto el presidente de la Republica del Congo, Denis Sassou Nguesso.
					La misiva senala:
					
					En esta oportunidad de celebrar el 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, le envio a Vd. la mas calurosa felicitacion en nombre del pueblo y el gobierno del Congo y en el mio propio y deseo al amistoso pueblo coreano la felicidad y prosperidad.
					
					Estoy convencido de que las relaciones de amistad entre nuestros dos paises se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de presidente de Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe felicitaciones de presidente de Uganda
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 30 de agosto el presidente de la Republica de Uganda, Yoweri Museveni.
					La misiva va como sigue: 
					
					En ocasion del 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hago llegar el calido saludo a Su Excelencia, y por su conducto, al gobierno y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en representacion del gobierno y el pueblo de Uganda. 
					
					Con motivo de ese dia jubiloso, el pueblo ugandes envia las felicitaciones a Su Excelencia y al pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea 
					
					Manifiesto a Su Excelencia mi satisfaccion a las excelentes relaciones y cooperacion existentes entre nuestros dos paises y reafirmo mi decision de trabajar estrechando los vinculos con Vd. para fortalecerlas mas de acuerdo con los intereses de nuestros dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de premier de Lesotho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de premier de Lesotho
						
Pyongyang, 5 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el 29 de agosto el premier del Reino de Lesotho, Thomas Motsoahe Thabane.
					La misiva senala:
					
					En esta oportunidad jubilosa de conmemorar el 64o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tengo gran honor de extender a Su Excelencia mi mas sincera felicitacion y votos.
					
					Celebrando este dia tan importante en la historia de la grandiosa Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, deseo ardientemente que las excelentes relaciones amables entre nuestros dos paises, se fortalezcan y se desarrollen mas conforme a los intereses mutuos de los pueblos de nuestros dos paises hermanos.
					
					Le deseo de todo corazon a Su Excelencia buena salud y al pueblo de la RPDC la paz y la prosperidad incesante.
